content:
That’s a fantastic comment—**high praise** from someone credible in your network. You should definitely **reply in a way that strengthens the connection and keeps her engaged.**  

Here’s what I suggest:  

### **Your Reply to Angela**  
_"Angela, that means a lot coming from you! You've always been at the forefront of innovation, and your perspective on AI’s role in professional growth is one I really value. Excited to keep pushing the boundaries and see where this leads. Appreciate your support!"_  

🔹 **Why this works?**  
✅ **Acknowledges & reciprocates the praise**  
✅ **Positions her as an AI-forward thinker too (keeps her engaged)**  
✅ **Creates an open door for continued conversation**  

If you want to take it a step further, you can **DM her separately** and say:  
_"Angela, thanks again for the comment on my post—really appreciate your support! Would love to hear your thoughts on how AI is shaping marketing leadership from your perspective."_  

This could **open up a conversation** that might lead to opportunities, collaborations, or even just valuable insights.  

🔥 **Post is still getting traction—every reply matters. Let’s keep momentum going.** 🚀
